programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2006/07 UEFA Champions League semi-final second leg between Liverpool and Chelsea at Anfield. Joe Cole's strike had given the Blues a 1-0 advantage in the first leg.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We rewind back to the 2006/07 UEFA Champions League final at the Olympic Stadium in Athens as AC Milan looked to avenge their defeat two years previously against the Reds.

programme.title: Liverpool v Arsenal 2007/08
programme.desc: We revisit a thrilling night at Anfield as Liverpool faced Arsenal in the quarter-final second leg of the 2007/08 UEFA Champions League. The first leg at the Emirates finished 1-1.

programme.title: Chelsea v Liverpool 2007/08
programme.desc: A look back at the semi-final second leg from the 2007/08 UEFA Champions League between Chelsea and Liverpool at Stamford Bridge. A tense first leg at Anfield had finished 1-1.

programme.title: Liverpool v Real Madrid 2008/09
programme.desc: We revisit a dramatic night at Anfield as Liverpool faced Real Madrid in the last 16 second leg of the 2008/09 UEFA Champions League. The Reds were 1-0 up from the first leg.

programme.title: Chelsea v Liverpool 2008/09
programme.desc: We revisit the 2008/09 UEFA Champions League quarter-final second leg between Chelsea and Liverpool at Stamford Bridge. Chelsea were impressive 3-1 first leg winners at Anfield.

programme.title: Liverpool v Manchester City

programme.title: UCL: Man City v Liverpool 2017/18
programme.desc: We revisit Manchester City and Liverpool's 2017/18 UEFA Champions League quarter-final second leg clash at the Etihad. The Reds thrashed City 3-0 at Anfield last time out.

programme.title: Liverpool v Roma 2017/18
programme.desc: We look back at Liverpool's enthralling clash with Roma in the 2017/18 UEFA Champions League semi-final first leg. Mo Salah was facing his old club for the first time.

programme.title: Liverpool v Paris Saint-Germain
programme.desc: We look back as last year's beaten finalists Liverpool met Paris Saint-Germain at Anfield in the Champions League. The French side hadn't won in four against English opposition.

programme.title: Liverpool v Napoli
programme.desc: We take a look back as Liverpool and Napoli meet in a huge UEFA Champions League clash at Anfield. The Reds knew they had to win to stand any chance of progressing.

programme.desc: We revisit the 2002/03 UEFA Champions League quarter-final second leg between Manchester United and Real Madrid at Old Trafford. A star-studded Madrid side won the first leg 3-1.

programme.title: Man Utd v Rangers 2003/04
programme.desc: We revisit the 2003/04 'Battle of Britain' UEFA Champions League group stage tie between Man Utd and Rangers at Old Trafford. Victory for United would almost seal a knockout spot.

programme.title: Manchester United v Porto 2003/04
programme.desc: We revisit the 2003/04 UEFA Champions League last 16 second leg between Man Utd and Jose Mourinho's Porto at Old Trafford. United lost the first leg 2-1, with Roy Keane seeing red.

programme.title: Man Utd v Fenerbahce 2004/05
programme.desc: We revisit the 2004/05 UEFA Champions League group stage tie between Manchester United and Fenerbahce at Old Trafford. The match saw Wayne Rooney make his highly anticipated debut.

programme.title: Manchester United v Celtic 2006/07
programme.desc: A look back at this enthralling 2006/07 UEFA Champions League group stage clash between Manchester United and Gordon Strachan's Celtic at Old Trafford.

programme.title: Manchester United v Roma 2006/07
programme.desc: We revisit the quarter-final second leg from the 2006/07 UEFA Champions League at Old Trafford between Manchester United and Roma. United had to overturn a 2-1 first leg deficit.

programme.title: Dynamo Kiev v Man Utd 2007/08
programme.desc: We revisit the 2007/08 UEFA Champions League group stage tie between Dynamo Kiev and Man Utd at the Olimpiysky NSC. Wayne Rooney was looking to score in his sixth consecutive game.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2007/08 UEFA Champions League semi-final second leg between Man Utd and Barcelona at Old Trafford. The tie was delicately poised after a 0-0 draw in the first leg.

programme.title: Champions League Final 2008
programme.desc: A look back at the 2007/08 UEFA Champions League final between Manchester United and Chelsea at Moscow's Luzhniki Stadium, the first all-English final in the competition's history.

programme.title: Arsenal v Man Utd 2008/09
programme.desc: We revisit the semi-final second leg from the 2008/09 UEFA Champions League between Arsenal and Manchester United. John O'Shea's goal had given United a 1-0 first leg advantage.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: A look back at the 2009 UEFA Champions League final between Barcelona and Man Utd in Rome. United were bidding to become the first team to defend the trophy in the modern era.

programme.title: Wolfsburg v Man Utd 2009/10
programme.desc: We revisit the 2009/10 UEFA Champions League group stage clash between Wolfsburg and Manchester United at the Volkswagen Arena. Victory for the United would send them progress.

programme.title: Man Utd v Real Madrid 2012/13
programme.desc: Cristiano Ronaldo made an emotional return to Manchester for the second leg of this last 16 tie from the 2012/13 UEFA Champions League. The first leg at the Bernabeu finished 1-1.
